# American Cinema Editors Award for Best Edited Animation (Non-Theatrical)

}}
The American Cinema Editors Award for Best Edited Animation â€“ (Non-Theatrical) is one of the annual awards given by the American Cinema Editors. The award was first presented at the 2021 ceremony.
